https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oHmukFeoJe4tSt1e5bHjnby7po6.jpg Takeharu Takami (Ryuhei Matsuda) is a bank teller, but he becomes allergic to money. He decides not to use money at all. Takeharu decides to move to a small village in the Tohoku region. There, he encounters residents who are not so easy. A Farewell to Jinu
